channel.title: Your Mom or Your Dad?
channel.description:
Your Mom or Your Dad?
which do you like better

So my dad

item.title: Your Mom or Your Dad?
item.dc:creator: @Swift Swift
item.description:
@Swift wrote:

Actually I like both of them. They’re both cool
My Dad I hardly get to see though. He has a job in trucking, so he drives all over the world.
I see him maybe once every other month for like one or two days if we’re lucky.
My Dad is the only one in our family who has a job two ( 4 kids, 2 parents. Wow lol. )

I guess we get awesome pay, cause we’re basically rich

mindhack:

its a phycalligy questions lol if your a male your prob going to say your mom but if your a female your going to say your dad unless you lesbian then you m0m. lol

well i complain about my mum more than my dad. But i cant pick i <3 them both

item.title: Your Mom or Your Dad?
item.dc:creator: @bam_bam bam bam
item.description:
@bam_bam wrote:

My Mom. My mother is always there for me, she understands things my father doesnt (i dont think he can even comprehend some of them). My mother understands what i got through with AS (Asperger Syndrome) even though it is a very mild case I dont think my father even cares enough to adjust or even believes i have it. My father also loads me up with chores when i refuse to go to my brothers baseball game or something (todays ex.: laundry downstairs, vacume first floor, mop kitchen, clean up bedroom, all trash at the end of the driveway) all expected to be done in an hour and half or so.

Definatly my Mom.

(I can think of “Nice” words to describe my father right now)

Read full topic

item.title: Your Mom or Your Dad?
item.dc:creator: @USMC USMC
item.description:
@USMC wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:33, topic:2537”]my mum ofcourse, my dad is a ***** ****… and i could go on for hours swearing about how he left when i was 6, my mum and dad got split up so he said he wud visit me on weekends… which i enjoyed because he took me really fun places, then he just sent me a letter to me and my sister sayign he cant see us anymore… for no reason at all, and ive never seen him again, didnt even get to say goodbye…[/quote]Thats Sad =(

Read full topic

item.title: Your Mom or Your Dad?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

[quote=“Big words, post:27, topic:2537”][quote author=Ron link=topic=2763.msg26958#msg26958 date=1147227154]
All my friends that are guys like their dads more than their moms cause their moms are always yelling at them and their dads let them get away with murder. Same goes for the friends of mine that are girls.

I guess it all depends though, you can’t just generalize, but in a way you’re right.

~Ron
[/quote]
i’m like that my dad lets me get away with anything, my mum just shouts at me and my dad just tells me to ignore her and my dad buys me stuff my mum wouldn’t like converses xD[/quote]

The mom in most families in the USA has truly become the Alpha Female. Scary as hell. Takes away the children, house, and forces the husband to pay child support.

Read full topic
